ModMetaData.name: Better Wool Production - C# Edition
ModMetaData.author: divineDerivative
ModMetaData.description:
Another continuation of Better Wool Production, but using C# to automagically make fleece for all wools. No more waiting for someone to add a patch for new mods, it just works!
• Shearable animals now yield unfinished fleece instead of wool, which needs to be processed into usable wool at a crafting spot or tailoring bench. • Butchering shearable animals now gives a reduced amount of fleece, about half what you would get from a normal shearing. • New recipe for blended wool, which can be made with random bits of wool, similar to patchleather
